018package org.tquadrat.foundation.util.internal;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
022
023import java.io.Serial;
024import java.util.Collection;
025import java.util.Comparator;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.Set;
028import java.util.TreeSet;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Pair;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.RangeMap;
034
035/**
036 *  The implementation of the interface
037 *  {@link RangeMap}.
038 *
039 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: RangeMapImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $
041 *  @since 0.0.7
042 *
043 *  @param <T>  The type of the mapped value.
044 *
045 *  @UMLGraph.link
046 */
047@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: RangeMapImpl.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $" )
048@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.7" )
049public sealed class RangeMapImpl<T> implements RangeMap<T>
050    permits FinalRangeMap
051{
052        /*------------*\
053    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
054        \*------------*/
055    /**
056     *  This flag determines if the limit belongs to the range or not.
057     */
058    private boolean m_Includes = false;
059
060    /**
061     *  The Ranges.
062     */
063    private final Set<Pair<Double, ? extends T>> m_Ranges = new TreeSet<>( Comparator.comparing( Pair::left ) );
064
065        /*------------------------*\
066    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
067        \*------------------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
070     *
071     *  @hidden
072     */
073    @Serial
074    private static final long serialVersionUID = -1094863662311849594L;
075
076        /*--------------*\
077    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
078        \*--------------*/
079    /**
080     *  Creates a new {@code RangeMap} instance. For this instance, the limit
081     *  does not belong to the range.
082     *
083     *  @see #RangeMapImpl(boolean)
084     */
085    public RangeMapImpl() { this( false ); }
086
087    /**
088     *  Creates a new {@code RangeMap} instance.
089     *
090     *  @param  includes    {@code true} if the limit belongs to the
091     *      range, {@code false} otherwise.
092     */
093    public RangeMapImpl( final boolean includes )
094    {
095        m_Includes = includes;
096    }   //  RangeMap()
097
098    /**
099     *  Creates a new {@code RangeMap} instance from an existing one.
100     *
101     *  @param  other   The other instance.
102     */
103    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
104    public RangeMapImpl( final RangeMapImpl<? extends T> other )
105    {
106        m_Includes = requireNonNullArgument( other, "other" ).m_Includes;
107        m_Ranges.addAll( other.m_Ranges );
108    }   //  RangeMap()
109
110    /**
111     *  Creates a new {@code RangeMap} instance from an instance of
112     *  {@link Map}.
113     *
114     *  @param  includes    {@code true} if the limit belongs to the
115     *      range, {@code false} otherwise.
116     *  @param  map   The map instance.
117     */
118    public RangeMapImpl( final boolean includes, final Map<? extends Number,? extends T> map )
119    {
120        this( includes );
121        requireNonNullArgument( map, "map" )
122            .forEach( ( key, value ) -> m_Ranges.add( new Pair<>( Double.valueOf( key.doubleValue() ), value ) ) );
123    }   //  RangeMap()
124
125    /**
126     *  Creates a new {@code RangeMap} instance from a list of
127     *  pairs.
128     *
129     *  @param  includes    {@code true} if the limit belongs to the
130     *      range, {@code false} otherwise.
131     *  @param  nvpList The list of entries.
132     */
133    public RangeMapImpl( final boolean includes, final Collection<? extends Map.Entry<? extends Number, ? extends T>> nvpList )
134    {
135        this( includes );
136        requireNonNullArgument( nvpList, "nvpList" ).forEach( e -> m_Ranges.add( new Pair<>( Double.valueOf( e.getKey().doubleValue() ), e.getValue() ) ) );
137    }   //  RangeMap()
138
139        /*---------*\
140    ====** Methods **==========================================================
141        \*---------*/
142    /**
143     *  {@inheritDoc}
144     */
145    @Override
146    public RangeMapImpl<T> addRange( final double key, final T value )
147    {
148        m_Ranges.add( new Pair<>( Double.valueOf( key ), requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) ) );
149
150        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
151        return this;
152    }   //  addRange()
153
154    /**
155     *  {@inheritDoc}
156     */
157    @Override
158    public void clear() { m_Ranges.clear(); }
159
160    /**
161     *  {@inheritDoc}
162     */
163    @Override
164    public final RangeMap<T> copy( final boolean modifiable )
165    {
166        final var retValue = modifiable ? new RangeMapImpl<>( this ) : new FinalRangeMap<>( this );
167
168        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
169        return retValue;
170    }   //  copy()
171
172    /**
173     *  {@inheritDoc}
174     */
175    @Override
176    public final Pair<Double,T> [] entries()
177    {
178        @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
179        final Pair<Double,T> [] retValue = m_Ranges.toArray( Pair []::new );
180
181        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
182        return retValue;
183    }   //  entries()
184
185    /**
186     *  {@inheritDoc}
187     */
188    @Override
189    public final T get( final double key )
190    {
191        if( m_Ranges.isEmpty() ) throw new IllegalStateException( "RangeMap does not have any entries" );
192
193        final var iterator = m_Ranges.iterator();
194        T retValue;
195        Pair<Double,? extends T> entry;
196        do
197        {
198            entry = iterator.next();
199            retValue = entry.right();
200        }
201        while( (m_Includes ? entry.left() < key : entry.left() <= key) && iterator.hasNext() );
202
203        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
204        return retValue;
205    }   //  get()
206
207    /**
208     *  {@inheritDoc}
209     */
210    @Override
211    public final boolean isEmpty() { return m_Ranges.isEmpty(); }
212
213    /**
214     *  {@inheritDoc}
215     */
216    @Override
217    public RangeMap<T> removeRange( final double key )
218    {
219        m_Ranges.remove( new Pair<>( Double.valueOf( key ), (T) null ) );
220
221        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
222        return this;
223    }   //  removeRange()
224
225    /**
226     *  {@inheritDoc}
227     */
228    @Override
229    public RangeMapImpl<T> setDefault( final T value )
230    {
231        final var entry = new Pair<>( Double.valueOf( Double.MAX_VALUE ), requireNonNullArgument( value, "defaultValue" ) );
232        if( !m_Ranges.add( entry ) )
233        {
234            m_Ranges.remove( entry );
235            m_Ranges.add( entry );
236        }
237
238        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
239        return this;
240    }   //  setDefault()
241
242    /**
243     *  Returns an immutable copy of the given {@code RangeMapImpl}.
244     *
245     *  @param  <T> The type of the mapped value.
246     *  @param  other   The other Range map.
247     *  @return The immutable copy.
248     */
249    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
250    public static <T> RangeMapImpl<T> unmodifiableRangeMap( final RangeMapImpl<? extends T> other )
251    {
252        final RangeMapImpl<T> retValue = new FinalRangeMap<>( requireNonNullArgument( other, "other" ) );
253
254        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
255        return retValue;
256    }   //  unmodifiableRangeMap()
257}
258//  class RangeMapImpl
259
260/*
261 *  End of File
262 */
